1.title: Episode #4.1

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Welsh couple Ben and Kate are looking to open a bar and look around 5 properties. Jo and Jan try to raise money for their dog shelter. Duncan offers his staff an unusual reward if they hit their sales target.

2.title: Episode #4.2

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Pest controller Graham battles critters, bugs and vermin in the Costa Del Sol. Margaret sells tickets for her Magical Mystery Tour and Kelly needs to raise money to pay for her vet bills.

3.title: Episode #4.3

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Lawrence and Lewis have a great idea for their bar on the day of a big England game, but events conspire against them. Jan and Jose help an abused dog. Former dancer Bambi is now selling caravans.

4.title: Episode #4.4

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Vince misunderstood exactly what he was paying for when he bought a bar. Former dancer Bambi plans a racy show to raise cash for a local dog rescue. Andy tours the coast buying and selling old furniture.

5.title: Episode #4.5

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Jacqui works the night markets down on the prom, Victor faces selling his motor-home of 18 years, Gary holds a cake-off competition to raise cash, and Colin's dance classes are the place to be on Wednesday nights.

6.title: Episode #4.6

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Horse rescue boss Jill Newman-Rodgers rushes to the aid of an abandoned animal. Glamorous young couple Nicole and Aaron want to travel the world putting on fitness boot-camps.

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Auction house owner Tony searches for new stock. Fitness instructor Anthony tries to solve his financial problems with a street party. Campsite entertainment manager Graham goes in search of new acts.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Wedding planner Louise has a big challenge in the form of bodybuilder bride Linda. Over at Camping Villamar, Paul and Debbie show off their customised caravan but need to boost revenue at their chip shop.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Cameras follow the fortunes of grandmother Linda, who was so moved by the plight of local dogs she set up a charity to rescue and re-home canines on the Costa Blanca. Mick and Karen decide to sell the showboat.

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Claire (formerly known as John) hosts a party for her friends at La Toretta Campsite. Auction house boss Tony is out to collect several pieces of furniture. Fitness instructor Anthony takes some of his clients on a mystery tour.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Leeds lad Mark is doing well on the cabaret circuit with his drag act Ruby Rox. Things are not going so well for Welshmen Mark and Blane who have sunk their savings into a tattoo parlour and need customers - fast.

6.title: Episode #2.6

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Drag artist Mark faces a potential disaster at the Benidorm Pride event. New faces in Benidorm include a family who run a car dealership and a chef who delivers traditional home-cooked British food to people's homes.

7.title: Episode #2.7

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: A single mum launches her own bar, the co-owners of a new radio station prepare to make their inaugural broadcast and fitness instructor Antony launches a new keep-fit class - aqua-aerobics.

8.title: Episode #2.8

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Middlesbrough man Michael has great ambitions for his new style of bar. Meanwhile, former criminal Rob and his partner Karen are struggling to keep their tattoo parlour in business.

1.title: Episode #3.1

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Paul offers a taste of home with his afternoon teas and five euro fry-ups. Scottish couple Dawn-Cherie and Tom bought a caravan online and plan to move into their cut-price holiday home. Karen has set up Spanish lessons for ex-pats.

2.title: Episode #3.2

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Newcomers Chris and Gary have decided to start a new life in Spain after saving money in a mattress. Meanwhile Scotsman Graham has set up his own organised pub crawl idea, but it's down to his team to attract customers.

3.title: Episode #3.3

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Chris and Gary have found the perfect apartment, and now Chris has a big question to ask his boyfriend. Retirees Ann and Mark make the most of Benidorm's camping scene. Bradford-born Chris opens an antique shop.

4.title: Episode #3.4

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Dave and Tony open a Mexican restaurant. Lisa and Tia buy a bar up in the hills and try to drum up trade. Dog rescuer Linda is worried about sick pup Donny, and Phil and Jackie from Sheffield scour the charity shops looking for bargains.

5.title: Episode #3.5

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Geoff becomes Benidorm's first Mr Whippy. Katie tries to persuade businesses to donate items for a charity auction. Mandy hopes to raise cash with arts and crafts, and drag artist Colin hopes to get promotional work with his horse.

6.title: Episode #3.6

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Cabaret star Mark is shooting a video. Vina and Nilam hope their curry business will be a success. Tattoo kings Blane and Mark are hoping to make big profits, and retired Stan searches for lost change on the beach to afford extra treats.

7.title: Episode #3.7

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Pete and Kath came to Benidorm to retire, but took on a bar. Michael's on a fishing trip with 3 mates from Villamar campsite. Anthony organises a coach trip to the Algar waterfalls, James and David have rented a working farm.

8.title: Episode #3.8

episode of.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Wayne and Des' charity hits its first birthday. Jonny Hellraiser has bought himself a 1950s-style diner. Business is hectic for wedding planner Louise, while auction boss Tony and old business partner Peter have gone their separate ways.

imdb.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
akas: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun (United Kingdom)
plot: Follows the lives of British people who have opted to move to Benidorm for a low-cost life full of fun in the sun.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
